description.zh: Python编程语言的基础概念和语法
description.en: Basic concepts and syntax of Python programming language

content.zh: 学习Python中的变量声明、基本数据类型（int, float, string, boolean）以及类型转换。
content.en: Learn variable declaration, basic data types (int, float, string, boolean) and type conversion in Python.

content.zh: 掌握if-else条件语句、for和while循环的使用方法。
content.en: Master the use of if-else conditional statements, for and while loops.

content.zh: 学习如何定义和调用函数，参数传递和返回值。
content.en: Learn how to define and call functions, parameter passing and return values.

content.zh: 掌握列表、元组、字典和集合的使用方法。
content.en: Master the use of lists, tuples, dictionaries and sets.

description.zh: NumPy库的基础知识和数组操作
description.en: Fundamentals of NumPy library and array operations

content.zh: 学习创建和操作NumPy数组，包括一维、二维和多维数组。
content.en: Learn to create and manipulate NumPy arrays, including 1D, 2D and multi-dimensional arrays.

content.zh: 掌握数组的数学运算、广播机制和向量化操作。
content.en: Master mathematical operations on arrays, broadcasting and vectorized operations.

content.zh: 学习数组的索引、切片和布尔索引技术。
content.en: Learn array indexing, slicing and boolean indexing techniques.

description.zh: Pandas库用于数据分析和处理
description.en: Pandas library for data analysis and processing

content.zh: 学习Pandas的核心数据结构DataFrame和Series的创建和基本操作。
content.en: Learn to create and perform basic operations on Pandas core data structures DataFrame and Series.

content.zh: 掌握数据的筛选、排序、分组和聚合操作。
content.en: Master data filtering, sorting, grouping and aggregation operations.

content.zh: 学习处理缺失值、重复数据和异常值的方法。
content.en: Learn methods for handling missing values, duplicate data and outliers.

description.zh: 使用Matplotlib进行数据可视化和图表绘制
description.en: Data visualization and chart plotting using Matplotlib

content.zh: 学习创建线图、散点图、柱状图等基础图表类型。
content.en: Learn to create basic chart types like line plots, scatter plots, bar charts, etc.

content.zh: 掌握图表的标题、标签、颜色、样式等定制化设置。
content.en: Master customization settings for plot titles, labels, colors, styles, etc.

content.zh: 学习创建子图和在同一画布上绘制多个图表。
content.en: Learn to create subplots and plot multiple charts on the same canvas.

description.zh: 人工智能基础概念和Python在AI中的应用
description.en: Basic concepts of artificial intelligence and Python applications in AI

content.zh: 了解机器学习、深度学习的基本概念和应用领域。
content.en: Understand basic concepts of machine learning, deep learning and their application areas.

content.zh: 介绍常用的Python AI库如scikit-learn、TensorFlow、PyTorch等。
content.en: Introduction to common Python AI libraries such as scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc.
